Kain lembut, chiffon kualiti, beli masa sale. Dapat harga sale murah. Harap dapat beli lgi harga murah. Chiffon ni tak panas. Sesuai pakai kemana sahaja.

Terima kasih semua item betul,tiada sebarang kerosakan.jahitan tepi kemas

Corak2 yang cantik,warna yang menarik
Sy suka pakai tudung Dari FAREHA dah banyak koleksi yang telah saya ada
Tudung Telah Diterima Cukup Lengkap Seperti Ordered. Kain Cotton Selesa Dipakai. Corak Menarik. Harga Murah Beli Masa Live. Highly Recommended & Thank You Seller
Beli masa live dapat harga rm5. 90 sehelai. Beli 3 helai terus grab. Puas hati. Corak cantik. Terima kasih seller. Nnty boleh beli lagi corak yang lain. Basuh dulu sebelum guna.
Cantik ya corak Amami ni 🥰 Beli utk jadikan hadiah utk kawan punya birthday. Terima kasih Fareha HQ buat sale harga murah2 sgt utk tudung yg berkualiti.
Chiffon material sangat bagus. Selesa dipakai Dan sejuk. Beli semasa live sangat berbaloi harga sangat Murah rugi beli satu je. Tapi banyak design sold out.

Ok la cantik harga pun ok. Boleh la buat raya. Service laju. Nanti boleh repeat lagi. Harga sangat la murah kalau nak bandingkan beli kat luar. Penghantaran pun laju. Material pun ok harap senang bentuk

Love this Chiffon Bawal! The material is soft, flowy, and definitely anti-kedut as promised. Easy to style and looks elegant for daily wear or special occasions. The Nagisa edition is beautiful and unique. Very satisfied with the quality and fast delivery. Will definitely repurchase. Highly recommended!

Gamble to buy these at the first place but somehow it's good material and quality too. My height is 170 and 70kg and surprisingly S size is perfectly suit me. So if you are my height and weight you might wanna get S size so that it looks cool on you.

The Roo Olive Green Polo Tee fits just right—exactly how an L size should be. The fabric feels comfortable, and the cut gives a nice balance between relaxed and fitted. The color is a nice, deep olive green that looks great in person. It’s breathable and works well for casual or semi-casual wear. Definitely a solid choice if you're looking for a well-sized, comfortable polo.
